name: Arcline
long_description:
Fast and predictable AI-native legal services designed for startups: If you’re a founder tired of spending $ X0k+ and months on a priced round, MSA, ESOP, product compliance, or cross-border legal work, we built Arcline for you. 

Arcline’s 40+ AI-native lawyers deliver legal services fast, quality-assured and affordable. 

So you can sell, raise, hire, and launch in hours, not months.

Arcline lawyers are trained at top schools (Harvard, Stanford, Oxford) and leading firms (Cooley, Goodwin, Fenwick). Trusted by founders backed by YC, Sequoia, a16z, Founders Fund.

We’re delivering the same top tier legal help to you, without the usual delay or cost. 

Discover Arcline if you want legal to stop being the bottleneck or crippling your runway.
one_liner: Fire your law firm: Cheaper and faster AI native lawyers for startups
